phrases: It is four in the morning...
The early bird catches the worm!
your regular duties at the inn to take care of,
you also have to help with the preparations for our wedding!
Thus, I have concluded that cutting the sleeping time
of you young ones, will be
the first step to making this a success.
Anyway, you now have a meeting with Enishing you must attend.
Here we go, to the staff dining room!
I wonder why Takako's so fired up suddenly.
Let us begin a wonderful day!
Come on, have a seat like everyone else, Ms. Tomoe.
We will now begin the meeting.
Anyway, what led Ryunosuke Akutagawa to write Rashomon?
a girl he would known since he was a child, had been called off...
Now's not a good time to bring up stuff like-
I cannot believe you called me in the middle of class.
I just have this image of you constantly at work.
I forgot that you are a high schooler.
I have got a lot to take care of.
I will send him a congratulatory message, though.
He is streaked ahead of you, huh?
Hey, your relationships with your boyfriends last too long, do not they?
What does it mean to you when you go out with someone?
You have gone and caught yourself another boyfriend?
Maybe it is because I still have a one-sided crush on your father.
You did not have to scream at me.
I thought I said something nice for a change.
I did not expect those words
I want to find a new love because
I cannot forget my old one.
I could not get anything out of that love.
But, well, it is been 15 years since your father died.
Recently, I have been thinking that maybe
I do not need to get anything out of it.
It is once in a lifetime that you meet someone you love so much.
Maybe the fact that I met him
Hearing her talk about her one-sided crush made
Why did I try to forget about Ko?
Minchi is so serious about Tohru...
Why did I think I could not have a one-sided crush on him?
It is not bad for an amateur's work.
All that is left is for someone to try it on,
so we can make some minor adjustments.
Could you try it on, Yuina?
I hear that putting on a wedding dress
delays your marriage in the future.
If I tried it, I would be dragging the bottom...
I feel like this is deja vu...
Not a pleasant deja vu either...
C-Can I take this off now?
Tomoe is doing our share of the duties at the inn right now, so...
Oh, we should ask Tsurugi to try it on, then!
She may not be as... big as Takako there,
but as long as hers are not bigger, she can try it on!
As long as hers are not bigger!
Looks like we are done for today.
You are going to start practicing making the dishes for the party now?
I sort of have an idea, but...
I told you, I do not need your help.
I have decided to stop spoiling her.
I noticed that you have to be hard on them when they are in a slump,
in order for them to overcome it.
Just like how you were ruthless with me back then.
but there are some minor adjustments we need to make, so...
I hate wearing things with frills.
I do not mind that you dislike me,
together with Yuina for Takako and the young master's wedding!
We worked really hard on it!
But you stepped all over his feelings for you!
I-I have decided that I have a one-sided crush on Ko!
I am going to be direct like you, Minchi!
Why do you have a crush?!
If I die, I will not be able to go out with anyone!
Besides, I have already decided that I have a crush on Ko!
You have never even seen him!
Anyone's a loser compared to Tohru!
I am kind of interested in Ohana.
But it is not like I want to do anything.
I just get excited watching her,
trying to imagine what kind of crazy stunt she will pull next.
On the other hand, you keep me in great suspense.
Sorry, did I just say something awful?!
You are willing to watch over me without even liking me...
You really are stupid, are not you?
I have got most of the dirt off.
I have never been in love before,
but I thought what you said was wonderful.
Fighting is not nice, but I think both of you are wonderful.
You are both able to love someone so much.
What do you mean, I am moved?
Hey, we should get her to hold some white flowers!
I have seen it on TV!
It is supposed to make it more appealing, right?
I will borrow the flowers by the staircase!
A-As in you are going to try and force me to go out with Tohru?
I want to go out with him, so...
I am not going to give that up.
I want to go out with him,
so I am going to continue my crush.
I am going to be direct like you said, so...
And after that, the preparations for the wedding went smoothly.
that I would confess to Ko after the wedding.
You decorated in even the smallest of places!
I have the feeling that this will
be a wonderful wedding thanks to you all.
This is the day a woman looks the prettiest in her life!
I have a favor to ask you.
I have not seen you since college.
When did you start dating Takako?
We have become bride and groom on this day,
and we are so happy to be able to announce
this to you all this afternoon.
We swear to work together as a married couple,
and to start up a warm, happy family.
Now we are in a race against time!
I am nervous about being the master of ceremonies...
Oshimizu looks so nice when she is hustling!
and decorate the dishes with the cucumbers?
Th-That is quite a lot of work.
Okay, I would like to read the congratulatory greetings now.
This is from the groom's older sister, Satsuki Matsumae.
They always say that a relationship gets better after a stormy fight,
but I am not sure what the weather is like today.
Either way, you need to make sure she is wet, all right?
The previous one was the last of them.
We are invited to the wedding too!
Wow, these are all so delicious!
It is the first time I have tasted Tohru's cooking like this.
I could not stop him from doing this.
Oh, where art thou, my destined love!
Do not react, or you will lose.
two lovers smile and laugh while being embraced by the white clouds.
Sunlight shines through a tiny gap,
and birds are singing freely beyond the windowsill.
Time will extend as long as their hands are held tight;
I did not help out with this wedding at all.
But these two, and the young workers at Kissuiso,
have created such an incredible ceremony.
I apologize for boring you with stories of my past,
but 40 years ago, I created Kissuiso
with my late husband, and with Denroku...
That is what it means to be young.
Even if you stumble and get lost,
you challenge yourself to new things.
You will be able to create something new.
I look forward to seeing the new things these two,
and the rest of Kissuiso create,
while I will sit back and enjoy my tea from the far distance.
Looks like everything's just about cleaned up.
about that speech you gave earlier...
The reason why I asked you all here...
is because Mr. Denroku told me the other day...
to succeed the logs he kept for over 40 years.
Does that mean you are quitting Kissuiso, Beanman?!
These logs are like a history book of Kissuiso.
The tears, the laughs... everything is written in here.
I am thinking about sealing Kissuiso, along with these logs,
after the Bonbori festival this year.
A man is responsible for waiting patiently.
Ohana, you are nothing like a bland coffee.
